com.seatunity.boardingpass.utilty
Class PkpassReader

java.lang.Object
  com.seatunity.boardingpass.utilty.PkpassReader

public class PkpassReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains all the utility methods to read a pkpass file using mainly the zip-utilities of Java.

getPassbookBarcode

public static org.json.JSONObject getPassbookBarcode(java.lang.String pkpassFilePath)
                                              throws org.json.JSONException
Static function returning the barcode information as a JSONObject , which is formatted as described here.

Parameters:
pkpassFilePath - The absolute file path of the file, usually got from file.getAbsolutePath(), where file is the File object of type only.
Returns:
JSONObject formatted as described here, or null if file is invalid or any other error occurs.
Throws:
org.json.JSONException - if the pass.json is ill-formed or doesn't have the field "barcode" as defined here.

getPassbookBarcodeString

public static java.lang.String getPassbookBarcodeString(java.lang.String pkpassFilePath)
                                                 throws org.json.JSONException
Static function returning the barcode information as a String formattable as JSONObject , which can be formatted as described here.

Parameters:
pkpassFilePath - The absolute file path of the file, usually got from file.getAbsolutePath(), where file is the File object of type only.
Returns:
String Formattable as a JSONObject
Throws:
org.json.JSONException - if the pass.json is ill-formed or doesn't have the field "barcode" as defined here.
